title: 'Destination 2050': European aviation players aim to chart pathway to net zero emissions
lead: Airlines, manufacturers, air traffic controllers, and airports claim that reducing net CO2 emissions to zero by 2050 from flights within and departing from the European Economic Area, Britain, and Switzerland is possible ...

title: Cost of biodiversity action will double if delayed until 2030, researchers warn
lead: Rate of endemic species' extinction could be slashed by a quarter if action is taken now, but policy delays will make this outcome more difficult to achieve and twice as expensive, report warns ...

title: Green hydrogen trialled at Port Talbot cement factory
lead: Hanson UK teams up with Swansea University for research into replacing fossil fuels in cement production ...

title: UK public awareness of 'net zero' surges in 2020
lead: Government's latest public attitudes survey indicates growing awareness of the net zero concept, although deeper understanding of the changes needed to deliver full decarbonisation remains scarce ...

title: Shell confirms oil production has peaked as it unveils 'accelerated' green plan
lead: Oil and gas giant sets sights on developing science-based climate targets, as hydrogen, nature based solutions, carbon capture, utility business, and electric vehicle infrastructure all earmarked for increased investment ...

title: 'Sensemaker in chief': Deloitte and IIF predict rise of the chief sustainability officer
lead: Networking, organisational knowledge, and a thorough grounding in the business singled out as essential attributes for CSOs in report from IIF and Deloitte ...

title: Speculation mounts over future of Drax's controversial 3.2GW gas power project
lead: Reports suggests energy giant could shelve plans for new gas plant, despite recent court victory ...

title: 'A shambles': Is the Green Homes Grant scheme budget being cut?

title: New £9m competition aims to put green train innovations on track
lead: New Department for Transport initiative designed to support the development of clean rail demonstration projects ...

title: Vestas unveils plans for record-breaking, super-sized 15MW offshore wind turbine
lead: Danish wind manufacturer says its new machine will set new industry benchmarks for rotor diameter, swept area, and power ...

title: Macquarie raises €1.6bn for clean energy fund as investors flock to low-carbon assets

title: Coca-Cola brings its first 100 per cent recycled plastic bottle to the US
lead: Firm plans to begin rolling out 100 per cent recycled plastic bottles for select Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta and Dasani water brands in coming months ...

title: Gillette sharpens its sustainability efforts as consumers call for greener packaging

title: Wood Mackenzie: Around half of global vehicle sales in 2050 will be zero emission

title: Defra unveils £10m fund to drive private investment in nature projects

title: South Pole adds Finnish biochar producer to its carbon removals portfolio

title: 'Lacks ambition': MPs urge government to step up efforts to tackle air pollution

lead: West Cumbria Mining's plan to open UK's first coal mine in 30 years to be reviewed 'in light of new information', says council ...

title: National Infrastructure Bank: Business leaders urge government to guarantee long-term survival of green bank

title: Poll: British exporters 'overwhelmingly' back more climate action from UK Export Finance

title: 'Time is of the essence': Elon Musk unveils $100m carbon capture competition

title: UN chief António Guterres: Preparatory COP26 climate talks should 'take place virtually'

title: 'Floods are here to stay': MPs slam government's flood defence planning

title: Dyfed Pension Fund cuts portfolio CO2 after reducing fossil fuel exposure
